title: BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania)
description: BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania) is an online gladiator IO action game where you are armed with savage weapons with one simple mission to take down every rival gladiator in sight. The battles are brutal, the carnage is real, and only the strongest will survive. Smash, slice, and crush your way to becoming the last warrior standing in this gruesome fight for supremacy. With each victory, you grow stronger, unlocking powerful upgrades and devastating new weapons to dominate the arena.
